about.title: About me
about.subtitle: About
about.text1: I am a communicative frontend developer with experience in developing web applications with JavaScript & Angular. So far, I have worked as business intelligence consultant acquiring skills in SQL, MDX, and database administration. However, I realized at a certain point that my passion lies with web development - here is my story:
about.text2: During my side job at a soap manufacture, I discovered my passion for web development and web design while working on the new webshop. I was supported by my family and friends to make my passion my profession.
about.text3: So I decided to become a frontend developer and take professional training from Developer Akademie to reach my goal. Here I have worked both on my own and in teams on various projects. This intensive training allowed me to quickly gain experience and deepen my knowledge.
about.text4: I am looking forward to continuing my career with a job as a web developer. If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, please do not hesitate to contact me!

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: This page shows some samples of my work - please feel free to try them out.
portfolio.rofText: A small game-app inspired by the popular drinking card game. Share the game with your friends and have fun!
portfolio.eplText: A Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio.joinText: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.pokedexText: Based on the PokéAPI library that provides and catalogues Pokémon information.
portfolio.donutText: This delivery service website was inspired by Lieferando. Main focus of this project is the simulation of an easy online shopping process.

contact.contactHeader: Want to discuss a new project?
contact.subheader: Say hello and let's realize your ideas together!
contact.name: Your name
contact.sendedText2: I will get back to you as soon as possible.
